title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Exploring the Value of Instructional Designers in Online Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional theory and understanding of online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can identify the values of key stakeholders (learners, teachers, institutions) when designing online language courses by applying a Value-Sensitive Design framework.
Learners can establish value-based design strategies reflecting their educational philosophy in various instructional design deliverables (activity design documents, assessment tools, etc.).
Learners can develop accessibility-focused instructional design solutions considering smartphone-based learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
